DOC.brief_summary: The study objective : 1 . To evaluate effect sildenafil citrate versus placebo IIEF_EF Domain end double-blind phase 2 . To assess relationship treatment sildenafil citrate placebo responses Quality Erection Questionnaire ( QEQ ) Sexual Experience Questionnaire ( SEX_Q ) .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Viagra 's Ability Provide Better Sexual Experience Through Quality Erections Satisfaction
DOC.criteria: Male subject age 1865 . Documented clinical diagnosis erectile dysfunction confirm IIEFEF Domain score less equal 25 . ( If subject score great 25 IIEFEF Domain , screen procedure terminate . ) Subjects treat 6 dos sildenafil citrate phosphodiesterase type 5 ( PDE5 ) inhibitor vardenafil tadalafil erectile dysfunction [ Note : subject take PDE5 inhibitor within 4 week prior date screening ] .
